name: VC3 logo expansion
description:
VC3 is a community-driven platform passionately owned and managed by a group of users who hold diverse perspectives on r/placeDE's moderation team. The revolution is considered a ban-worthy topic in r/placede's server due to its controversial nature. Embracing a spirit of independence and a desire for constructive dialogue, this community welcomes users who have experienced difficulties in r/placeDE's discord server or VC3, fostering an inclusive environment for open discussions.
We also have an alliance with the German south flag.
